common.trigger_behavior_description: The behavior of the targeted climates to trigger on.

condition_type.is_hvac_mode: {entity_name} is set to a specific HVAC mode
condition_type.is_preset_mode: {entity_name} is set to a specific preset mode

humidity_out_of_range.message: Provided humidity {humidity} is not valid. Accepted range is {min_humidity} to {max_humidity}.

low_temp_higher_than_high_temp.message: 'Lower target temperature' can not be higher than 'Upper target temperature'.

missing_target_temperature_entity_featur.message: Set temperature action was used with the 'Target temperature' parameter but the entity does not support it.

missing_target_temperature_range_entity_.message: Set temperature action was used with the 'Lower/Upper target temperature' parameter but the entity does not support it.

not_valid_fan_mode.message: Fan mode {mode} is not valid. Valid fan modes are: {modes}.

not_valid_horizontal_swing_mode.message: Horizontal swing mode {mode} is not valid. Valid horizontal swing modes are: {modes}.

not_valid_hvac_mode.message: HVAC mode {mode} is not valid. Valid HVAC modes are: {modes}.

not_valid_preset_mode.message: Preset mode {mode} is not valid. Valid preset modes are: {modes}.

not_valid_swing_mode.message: Swing mode {mode} is not valid. Valid swing modes are: {modes}.

temp_out_of_range.message: Provided temperature {check_temp} is not valid. Accepted range is {min_temp} to {max_temp}.

toggle.description: Toggles climate device, from on to off, or off to on.
toggle.name: [%key:common::action::toggle%]

current_humidity_changed.description: Triggers after the humidity measured by one or more climate-control devices changes.

above.description: Trigger when the humidity is above this value.
above.name: Above

below.description: Trigger when the humidity is below this value.
below.name: Below

current_humidity_changed.name: Climate-control device current humidity changed

current_humidity_crossed_threshold.description: Triggers after the humidity measured by one or more climate-control devices crosses a threshold.

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold crossing to trigger on.
threshold_type.name: Threshold type

current_humidity_crossed_threshold.name: Climate-control device current humidity crossed threshold

current_temperature_changed.description: Triggers after the temperature measured by one or more climate-control devices changes.

above.description: Trigger when the temperature is above this value.
above.name: Above

below.description: Trigger when the temperature is below this value.
below.name: Below

current_temperature_changed.name: Climate-control device current temperature changed

current_temperature_crossed_threshold.description: Triggers after the temperature measured by one or more climate-control devices crosses a threshold.

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold crossing to trigger on.
threshold_type.name: Threshold type

current_temperature_crossed_threshold.name: Climate-control device current temperature crossed threshold

hvac_mode_changed.description: Triggers after the mode of one or more climate-control devices changes.

hvac_mode.description: The HVAC modes to trigger on.
hvac_mode.name: Modes

hvac_mode_changed.name: Climate-control device mode changed

started_cooling.description: Triggers after one or more climate-control devices start cooling.
started_cooling.name: Climate-control device started cooling

started_drying.description: Triggers after one or more climate-control devices start drying.
started_drying.name: Climate-control device started drying

started_heating.description: Triggers after one or more climate-control devices start heating.
started_heating.name: Climate-control device started heating

target_humidity_changed.description: Triggers after the humidity setpoint of one or more climate-control devices changes.

above.description: Trigger when the target humidity is above this value.
above.name: Above

below.description: Trigger when the target humidity is below this value.
below.name: Below

target_humidity_changed.name: Climate-control device target humidity changed

target_humidity_crossed_threshold.description: Triggers after the humidity setpoint of one or more climate-control devices crosses a threshold.

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold crossing to trigger on.
threshold_type.name: Threshold type

target_humidity_crossed_threshold.name: Climate-control device target humidity crossed threshold

target_temperature_changed.description: Triggers after the temperature setpoint of one or more climate-control devices changes.

above.description: Trigger when the target temperature is above this value.
above.name: Above

below.description: Trigger when the target temperature is below this value.
below.name: Below

target_temperature_changed.name: Climate-control device target temperature changed

target_temperature_crossed_threshold.description: Triggers after the temperature setpoint of one or more climate-control devices crosses a threshold.

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold crossing to trigger on.
threshold_type.name: Threshold type

target_temperature_crossed_threshold.name: Climate-control device target temperature crossed threshold

turned_off.description: Triggers after one or more climate-control devices turn off.
turned_off.name: Climate-control device turned off

turned_on.description: Triggers after one or more climate-control devices turn on, regardless of the mode.
turned_on.name: Climate-control device turned on
